headline: Jim Cramer on Union Pacific’s Upcoming Merger: “Great Situation”
summary: Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE:UNP) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer commented on along with the recent macro rally. Cramer highlighted the company’s upcoming merger during the episode, as he remarked: “Next group… the transports, which are also in breakout mode. We know that Union Pacific’s doing extraordinarily well, about to merge with Norfolk Southern. […]
